alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:34PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Pasco, north central Pinellas and Hillsborough Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 433 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near East Lake to Egypt Lake-Leto to near Brandon. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARDS...Pea size hail. Funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Plant City, Temple Terrace, Fish Hawk, Lutz, Brandon, Palm Harbor, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, East Lake-Orient Park, Egypt Lake-Leto, Greater Carrollwood, Riverview, University, Keystone, Greater Northdale, East Lake, Pebble Creek and Citrus Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
